PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-07872015-06-10NR,  CRA,  ,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Mandatory Electronic Filing — Prescribed Information Returns)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MANDATORY ELECTRONIC FILING — PRESCRIBED INFORMATION RETURNS) in order to (1) enable the implementation of the new graduated penalty structure; and (2) expand the scope of mandatory electronic filing to achieve cost savings and increase efficiency.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0140 Publication Date: 2015-07-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Mandatory Electronic Filing — Prescribed Information Returns)
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MANDATORY ELECTRONIC FILING — PRESCRIBED INFORMATION RETURNS) in order to (1) enable the implementation of the new graduated penalty structure; and (2) expand the scope of mandatory electronic filing to achieve cost savings and increase efficiency.
